classes.name: SSHFile
classes.description: File on a remote file system using SSH to access it

classes.name: SSHFolder
classes.description: Folder on a remote file system using SSH to access it

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Execute a single command and return immediately. This command will connect the session, request an execution channel, execute the command and close the execution channel. The session is open automatically if not opened yet, but will remain open after the command execution. Use disconnect to close the session. Value of the exitCode property is changed to -1 for initializing, 0 if successful, and positive number if an error occured.

methods.name: executeAndLog
methods.description: Execute a single command and wait until end. Value of the exitCode property is changed to -1 for initializing, 0 if successful, and positive number if an error occurred.

methods.name: executeCommand
methods.description: Execute a single command and wait until completed, return the stdout result if synchronous. This command will connect the session, request an execution channel, execute the command and close the execution channel. The session is open automatically if not opened yet, but will remain open after the command execution. Use disconnect to close the session. Value of the exitCode property is changed to -1 for initializing, 0 if successful, and positive number if an error occured.

methods.name: setEncoding
methods.description: Sets the encoding that will be used to process the results from executeCommand method.

methods.name: getEncoding
methods.description: Returns the encoding used by this SSHCommand

methods.name: getFile
methods.description: Copy a file FROM a remote host TO the vCO Server. This command will connect the session, request an execution channel, execute the command and close the execution channel. The session is open automatically if not opened yet, but will remain open after the command execution. Use disconnect to close the session. Returns 0 if successful, or -1 if an error has occurred.

methods.name: putFile
methods.description: Copy a file TO a remote host FROM the vCO Server. Returns 0 if successful, or -1 if an error has occurred. If a remote file name is provided, the destination file name will use it. If only the destination directory is specified, then the destination file will use the source file name. The destination directory must exist.

methods.name: findAll
methods.description: Recursively search and return matching pattern file and directory. This command will connect the session, request an execution channel, execute the command and close the execution channel. The session is open automatically if not opened yet, but will remain open after the command execution. Use disconnect to close the session.

methods.name: findFile
methods.description: Recursively search and return matching pattern file ONLY. This command will connect the session, request an execution channel, execute the command and close the execution channel. The session is open automatically if not opened yet, but will remain open after the command execution. Use disconnect to close the session.

methods.name: findDir
methods.description: Recursively search and return matching pattern directory ONLY.  This command will connect the session, request an execution channel, execute the command and close the execution channel. The session is open automatically if not opened yet, but will remain open after the command execution. Use disconnect to close the session.

methods.name: listAll
methods.description: List files and directories in path. This command will connect the session, request an execution channel, execute the command and close the execution channel. The session is open automatically if not opened yet, but will remain open after the command execution. Use disconnect to close the session.

methods.name: listFile
methods.description: List files ONLY in path. This command will connect the session, request an execution channel, execute the command and close the execution channel. The session is open automatically if not opened yet, but will remain open after the command execution. Use disconnect to close the session.

methods.name: listDir
methods.description: List directories ONLY in path. This command will connect the session, request an execution channel, execute the command and close the execution channel. The session is open automatically if not opened yet, but will remain open after the command execution. Use disconnect to close the session.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Disconnects the current session if open. The session parameters are given in the object constructor (host, username, password); a session is opened automatically when any method is called that requires a session (like execute). Once open, the session remains open; any method uses the same session but opens a new channel and the closes it when done. You need to use this disconnect method to close the session.

classes.name: SSHSession
classes.description: SSH Session to username@host:port. This object replace the old 'SSHCommand' object.

methods.name: connectWithPassword
methods.description: Connect the session using simple username/password authentication.

methods.name: connectWithIdentidy
methods.description: Deprecated use connectWithIdentity(). Connect the session using Public key Authentication.

methods.name: connectWithIdentity
methods.description: Deprecated use connectWithIdentity(). Connect the session using Public key Authentication.

methods.name: connectWithPasswordOrIdentity
methods.parameters: isPassword: boolean, password: SecureString, privateKeyPath: string
methods.description: Connect the session using either password or Public key Authentication.

methods.name: setUserInfo
methods.description:
The provided userInfo object is used for callback for the keyboard-interactive authentication and for the other types of messages send from the remote server during authentication. The function signatures should be:

Example:

methods.name: addEnvironment
methods.description: Fills a property list of environment variables that will be set prior to opening a channel.

methods.name: setConnectTimeout
methods.description: Set connection timeout, in milliseconds

methods.name: getConnectTimeout
methods.description: Get connection timeout

methods.name: setTimeout
methods.description: Set socket timeout, in milliseconds

methods.name: getTimeout
methods.description: Get socket timeout

methods.name: setKeepAliveInterval
methods.description: Set an interval, in milliseconds, to send keep-alive message. If zero, keep-alive message will not be sent.

methods.name: getKeepAliveInterval
methods.description: Get keep-alive interval

methods.name: setKeepAliveCountMax
methods.description: Set the number of keep-alive messages that may be sent before the connection is considered to have failed.

methods.name: getKeepAliveCountMax
methods.description: Get keep-alive messages count threshold

methods.name: setEncoding
methods.description: Sets the encoding that will be used to process the results from executeCommand method

methods.name: getEncoding
methods.description: Returns the encoding used by this SSHSession

classes.name: KeyPairManager
classes.description: Set of functions to manage private/public keys.

methods.name: generateKeyPair
methods.parameters: type: string, path: any, passphrase: any, keySize: number, comment: string
methods.description: Generate a pair of public/private key. Returns the generated key fingerprint.

methods.name: changePassphrase
methods.parameters: path: any, oldPasspharse: any, newPassphrase: any
methods.description: Change the passphrase of a private key.

classes.name: SSHHostManager
classes.description: SSHHostManager provides CRUD operations for the SSHHost objects

methods.name: addSshHost
methods.description: Adds a SSH Host

methods.name: removeSshHost
methods.description: Removes a SSH Host

methods.name: updateSshHost
methods.description: Updates a SSH Host

methods.name: getSshHost
methods.description: Gets a SSH Host

methods.name: getSshHosts
methods.description: Gets all SSH Hosts

methods.name: addRootFolderToHost
methods.description: Adds a Root Folder to SSH Host

methods.name: removeRootFolderFromHost
methods.description: Removes a Root Folder from SSH Host
